name: DOCS_RCVD_VTLS
description: This table stores discrete vitals information received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: VTL_REF_ID
columns.description: The unique reference identifier associated with the vital reading.

columns.name: VTL_DATETIME
columns.description: This item stores the date and time when the vital data were measured by the external system.

columns.name: VTL_HEIGHT
columns.description: The patient height for the vital reading in centimeters.

columns.name: VTL_WEIGHT
columns.description: This item stores the patient weight for the vital (unit is kg).

columns.name: VTL_CIRCUM
columns.description: The patient head circumference for the vital measurement in centimeters.

columns.name: VTL_DXR_CSN
columns.description: This item will store the contact serial number (CSN) of the Document Received record that owns the instance of this vital.

columns.name: VTL_HEIGHT_SRC_VALUE
columns.description: Raw value of the height measurement in the document.

columns.name: VTL_HEIGHT_SRC_UNIT
columns.description: Unit used for the height measurement in the document.

columns.name: VTL_WEIGHT_SRC_VALUE
columns.description: Raw value of the weight measurement in the document.

columns.name: VTL_WEIGHT_SRC_UNIT
columns.description: Unit used for the weight measurement in the document.

columns.name: VTL_CIRCUM_SRC_VALUE
columns.description: Raw value of the head circumference measurement in the document.

columns.name: VTL_CIRCUM_SRC_UNIT
columns.description: Unit used for the head circumference measurement in the document.

columns.name: VTL_PULSE
columns.description: The pulse reading of the vital reading in beats per minute.

columns.name: VTL_SYSTOLIC_BP
columns.description: This item stores the systolic blood pressure reading for the vital in the document (unit is mm[Hg]).

columns.name: VTL_DIASTOLIC_BP
columns.description: This item stores the diastolic blood pressure reading for the vital in the document (unit is mm[Hg]).

columns.name: VTL_BMI
columns.description: The body mass index for the vital measurement in kilograms per square meter.

columns.name: VTL_LST_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last update instant of the vital in UTC.

columns.name: VTL_TEMP
columns.description: This item stores the patient temperature vital in Celsius.

columns.name: VTL_RESP
columns.description: This item stores the patient's respirations per minute vital.

columns.name: VTL_SPO2
columns.description: The pulse oximetry of the vital reading in percent.

columns.name: VTL_SRC_VALUE
columns.description: The source value of the received vital reading before it is converted to a number.

columns.name: VTL_SRC_UNIT
columns.description: The source unit of the received vital reading before it is converted.

columns.name: VTL_EVENT_IDENT
columns.description: Universally unique identifier for the encounter document associated with this vital reading. In cases where there are multiple encounters that link to a vital reading, the earliest encounter is represented here.

columns.name: VTL_ORGANIZER
columns.description: Identifier that groups vitals that should be associated together.
